homePage.mainProvisionsText1: This panel is designed for convenient server management, including categories (disciplines), channels, roles (groups) of users, the users themselves, queues for defenses, and action logs. Each section is intuitive and allows you to perform the necessary administrative functions efficiently and quickly.
homePage.mainProvisionsText2: Use the sidebar on the left for navigation. Each menu section is responsible for a specific server management area. Icons are used on the pages for quick identification of actions and functions.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Home page of the server control panel with a description of the purpose, overview, and explanation of common actions available in the interface

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: This section allows you to manage categories (disciplines) on the server. Categories are used to structure channels and manage access to them

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: This section allows you to manage roles (groups) for users on the server. Roles are used to assign access rights to a specific category

users.title: Users
users.description: This section is intended for managing server users. Here you can view, rename, edit roles, and kick users from the server. It is also possible to filter users by their role

events.title: Queues
events.description: This section allows you to create queues for students. Queues are available as an interactive list that students can join and leave

logs.title: Logs
logs.description: This section provides access to the interaction log with the control panel. Tracks the actions of panel users and allows you to view them

hint.title: Hint
hint.description: Indicates the availability of additional information about or how to use it

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Opens the filter panel, which allows you to narrow down the data display results

createChannel.title: Create Channel
createChannel.description: Used to create a new channel within a specific category

createCategory.title: Create Category
createCategory.description: Used to create a new category with channels (disciplines)

edit.title: Edit
edit.description: Used to open the access and roles (groups) settings panel

createRole.title: Create (assign) roles
createRole.description: Used to create and assign roles (groups)

rename.title: Rename
rename.description: Used to rename items such as categories, channels, roles and users

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Used to delete a category, channels, or roles (groups) from the server

kickUser.title: Kick User
kickUser.description: Used to kick a specific user from the academic discord server

edit.role: Edit the list of users with a role "{{itemName}}"

create.category: A category should be thought of as a discipline, or a section with its own channels and access to it for some roles. After creating a category, it will be at the bottom of the list
create.channel: Enter a name for the channel and select its type
create.role: A role is a specific group that a user can have on the server. It can be used to classify students by grade level, discipline, or other characteristics and will be sorted on the page after creation

rename.category: Case is not taken into account for the category name and is processed automatically
rename.channel: Case is not taken into account for the channel name and is processed automatically

edit.category: Select roles for access to the category and all its channels. It is advisable not to add the student and teacher roles to the category, as this will make it visible to everyone with these roles, even if they do not need it. Consider the comfort of others!

delete.category: When deleting a category, all channels in it will also be deleted

error.fetchAllRolesError: Failed to load roles list from server
error.fetchCategoryRolesError: Failed to change the list of roles that have access to the category
error.fetchUserRolesError: Failed to load user roles list
error.saveCategoryPermissionsError: Failed to change role access settings to the category
error.fetchEditableRolesError: Failed to load list of available roles
error.createQueueMessageError: Failed to create queue on server
error.fetchRoleHoldersError: Failed to load list of users with selected role
error.saveRoleHoldersError: Failed to save updated list of users with role
error.createStaffInfoMessageError: Failed to create staff information message

warnings.noCategoryRoles: No roles with access to this category
warnings.noRoleHolders: No users with this role found

logsPage.filterHintText: Filters allow you to display logs for the selected time period. The first click determines the beginning of the search period, and the second determines its end.

pcViewOnlyPage.title: Resource unavailable
pcViewOnlyPage.description: Sorry, but the control panel does not support viewing from mobile devices.

noAccessPage.title: Access denied
noAccessPage.description:
Sorry, you do not have access rights to the control panel. 
To get access, contact your administrator, or log in with another account.

loginPage.title: Authorization required to access the control panel
loginPage.description:
We use Discord OAuth2 to identify users. 
Click the button below to log in via Discord account.

settings.registrationChannel: Channel with instruction for registering students on the server
settings.staffChannel: Channel for messages with information about the web panel for teachers
